query.statement:
MERGE INTO SAPHEE.ZCST950N AS A USING ( SELECT BSU ,COUNT(A.PJT) AS CVQ ,SUM( CASE WHEN A.KND <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) CVQ_FM ,SUM( CASE WHEN A.HYN = 'Y' AND A.KND = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) CVQ_PRTS ,SUM( CASE WHEN A.HYN = 'Y' AND A.KND <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) CVQ_FRTS ,SUM( CASE WHEN A.TGB = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) CVQ_TGB ,SUM(SAPHEE.GET_DAYS( VALUE(A.BMT_B, A.ISD) , A.GDATE )) CVQ_DAYS ,SUM(CASE WHEN SAPHEE.MONTH_BETWEEN( VALUE(A.BMT_B, A.ISD) ,A.GDATE,'2') <= 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CVQ_3 ,SUM(CASE WHEN SAPHEE.MONTH_BETWEEN( VALUE(A.BMT_B, A.ISD) ,A.GDATE,'2') >= 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CVQ_3E ,SUM(CASE WHEN SAPHEE.MONTH_BETWEEN( VALUE(A.BMT_B, A.ISD) ,A.GDATE,'2') <= 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CVQ_1 FROM ( SELECT A.PJT ,A.HNO ,MAX(A.GNO ) GNO ,MAX(A.GDATE) GDATE ,MAX(A.ARA ) ARA ,MAX(A.BSU ) BSU ,MAX(A.KND ) KND ,MAX(A.HYN ) HYN ,MAX(A.TGB ) TGB ,MAX(A.BMT_B) BMT_B ,MAX(A.ISD ) ISD FROM ( SELECT A.PJT ,A.HNO ,A.GNO ,A.GDATE ,CASE WHEN A.IKD > A.GDATE THEN C.CS157_CAB WHEN A.IKD <= A.GDATE THEN C.CS157_CAA ELSE A.ARA END ARA ,CASE WHEN A.IKD > A.GDATE THEN C.CS157_CHB WHEN A.IKD <= A.GDATE THEN C.CS157_CHA ELSE A.BSU END BSU ,CASE WHEN A.IKD > A.GDATE THEN C.CS157_GHB WHEN A.IKD <= A.GDATE THEN C.CS157_GHA ELSE A.TGB END TGB ,A.KND ,A.HYN , (SELECT MAX(CS116_BMT) FROM SAPHEE.ZCST116 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS116_PJT = A.PJT AND CS116_HNO = A.HNO AND CS116_PST = 'A6' AND CS116_GND = 'B') BMT_B ,VALUE(D.CS101_ISD,'') ISD
FROM ( SELECT CS126_PJT PJT ,CS126_HNO HNO ,CS126_GNO GNO ,MIN(CS126_USD) USD ,MIN(CS126_ADT) ADT ,MAX(CS126_UHJ) UHJ ,MAX(CS126_UMR) UMR ,MIN(CS126_ADT) GDATE ,MAX(CS126_KND) KND ,MAX(CS126_HYN) HYN ,MAX(CS126_TGB) TGB ,MAX(CS126_ARA) ARA ,MAX(CS126_BSU) BSU ,MIN(B.CS157_IKD) IKD
FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST157 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS126_PJT = B.CS157_PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = B.CS157_HNO AND B.CS157_IKD > A.CS126_ADT AND B.CS157_GND = 'D'
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_GND = 'D' AND A.CS126_GKD = '1' AND A.CS126_SLA = 'N' AND SUBSTR(A.CS126_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W','C') AND CASE WHEN substr(CS126_ADT,1,6) >= substr(CS126_USD,1,6) THEN CS126_ADT ELSE CS126_USD END BETWEEN SUBSTR(#GDATE# ,1,4)||'0101' AND #GDATE#
GROUP BY CS126_PJT,CS126_HNO,CS126_GNO
) A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST111 B ON B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = B.PJT AND A.HNO = B.HNO AND B.EXC = ''
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST157 C ON C.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = C.CS157_PJT AND A.HNO = C.CS157_HNO AND A.IKD = C.CS157_IKD AND C.CS157_GND = 'D'
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST101 D ON D.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = D.CS101_PJT AND A.HNO = D.CS101_HNO AND D.CS101_PST = 'A6'
) A
GROUP BY A.PJT, A.HNO
) AS A
GROUP BY BSU
) AS B ON A.BSU = B.BSU AND A.YYYYMM = #YYYYMM# AND A.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
WHEN MATCHED THEN
UPDATE SET CVQ = B.CVQ ,CVQ_FM = B.CVQ_FM ,CVQ_PRTS = B.CVQ_PRTS ,CVQ_FRTS = B.CVQ_FRTS ,CVQ_TGB = B.CVQ_TGB ,CVQ_DAYS = B.CVQ_DAYS ,CVQ_3 = B.CVQ_3 ,CVQ_3E = B.CVQ_3E ,CVQ_1 = B.CVQ_1
